title: Gift Button disappeared
body: Tried to Gift my friend a skin today, but when i opened up store the gift button supposed to be right next to the RP button (which was there) had disappeared. Best answer with an explanation for wth happened or if its a fixable problem or not. Running the standard Microsoft Windows client btw.

replies.body: Update: Same problem when I reran the client, but then I ran as admin and it returned. You can ignore this post now.

If you haven't already, I recommend you set League up to permanently run as admin. Since League interacts with a lot of files outside of the League folder, and it requires permissions to run specific components, it needs system permissions to run properly most of the time. [This step](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104#wq3) out of our Permissions Guide will help you out with that.
